def_en: If you have an obligation to do something, it is your duty to do that thing.

def_cn: (照顾某人或保护某人利益的)义务，责任
def_en: If you have an obligation to a person, it is your duty to look after them or protect their interests.

def_cn: (广告中产品或服务)免费试用地，免费体验地
def_en: In advertisements, if a product or a service is available without obligation, you do not have to pay for that product or service until you have tried it and are satisfied with it.
